word: God is the eternal, uncreated fountain of all good. All who look to Him and trust in Him find Him to be this. To those who serve Him, cleaving to Him as their heavenly Father, He gives the assurance that He will fulfil His promises. His joy will be in their hearts, and their joy will be full.--Letter 203, Sept. 14, 1903, "To Those in Positions of Responsibility in Nashville Publishing House."
